summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 3, Ashford Add., being the alley between 37th Ave. S.W. and 36th Ave. S.W. from S.W. Kenyon St. to S.W. Holden St.; by paving the same; by doing such grading or regrading as may be necessary; providing for the necessary surface drainage; all in accordance with Res. No. 24909 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a Local Improvement District therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
